revised_title: Investigation of Refraction of Plane Polarized Light in Uniaxial Crystals
tldr: This paper presents an experimental investigation of the relationship between the plane of polarized light falling on a uniaxial crystal and the angles of incidence and refraction. The study focuses on the refraction of plane polarized light at the surface of a uniaxial crystal, such as Iceland spar, and provides insights into the behavior of light in these materials.
